# Create the Crabs project

In this section you create a project for your team.


* Click on the `Teams` tab

<center><img src="images/Click_on_teams.png"></center>

* Click on your `Crabs team`

<center><img src="images/Click_on_crabs_team.png"></center>

You are now in the Crabs team home page.
\
* Click on `+ New project`
<center><img src="images/Click_on_add_project.png"></center>

* Enter `Crabs project` in the `Name` tab

* Provide a "Project description" in the `Description`
<center><img src="images/Give_name_description_to_project.png"></center>
\
* Click `OK`

<center><img src="images/View_completed_new_project.png"></center>


You are now on the homepage of your new project.
You can observe the tools:


`New data set`  
    `New workflow`  
    `New file`  
    `Import file`  
    `Import a workflow`  

You have now created a new project for your team. In the next section you install usefull operators for your team.
